publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 141
ab.l: Miźmoru David́niń E H čaɣyramyn saja ǯaḥtlaɣyn boluš- luɣuma ḿenim qulaḥ salɣyn avazyma čaɣyrɣanymda saja.
T́uźuĺśuń tefilam t́ut́u kibik alnyjda ḱot́urḿagi uvuč- larymnyn saɣyšlansyn tirkisi ornuna ińgirniń.
Qojɣun e H saqlav avzuma abraɣyn ačylmaɣyn erińĺarimniń.
Qajyrmaɣyn juŕagimni jaman śoź- ǵa syltav et́ḿa syltavlar qynɣyrlyɣy byla eŕańĺarniń qyluvčular avanlyḥny da ašamajym tatly ašlarym alarnyn.
Vatsady ḿeni rast ševaɣat byla da üǵut́ĺaśad́a ḿeni oliva kibik bašyma avrutmastyr bašymny ki hanuz tefilam jaman iš́ĺari üč́uń.
Tašlansynlar qyryjyna skalanyn t́oŕačiĺari alarnyn da ešit́sińĺar ajtmaḥlarymny ki č́eb́ardir- ĺar.
Ńečik tŕeśqa yšturuvču da otun jarčyḥlavču jerd́a alej tozuldular śuv́akĺarimiź qyryjyna ǵorńuń.
Ki saja e H Teńrim t́eĺḿaŕadirĺar ḱoźĺarim saja išanamyn vaḥtsyz almaɣyn ǯanymny.
Saq- laɣyn ḿeni qollaryndan tuzaḥnyn ki tuzaḥ turɣuzdular maja da jajdylar avlaryn qyluvčular avanlyḥny.
T́uš́śuńĺar avlaryna rašaʿlar birǵa vaĺe ḿeń dunjaɣa dejiń ašḥejmyn išanč byla ki śuŕuńḿagejmiń alarda.
